', 'A pleasure to work with!', 'Excellent designer and understood the design requirements  ', 'Good work im happy']

about:
Hello, my name is Joshua Tavener and I am a graphic designer and illustrator currently based in Melbourne. I create colourful and bold designs through an amalgamation of (digital) illustration and experimental typography.
  My goal is to create bright and evocative designs that push the envelope of artistry with a sense of lightness.

about: Baguio City, Philippines based artist Mark aka. Deo Dude is an artist specializing in logo designs, vector and raster illustrations. He's been making arts and illustrations since he can remember. Started as a freelancer in the traditional arts and lately in the animation field which was cut short. He never let go of his love for illustrations and graphic design. Now he's devoted his time and craft as a designer and illustrator.

about: I am a young graphic designer. I am particularly interested in modern, minimal and abstract logo designs. I use Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop to create my logo designs. If you have any questions about my work, please feel free to message me. :)

about: I really love expressing myself through illustration and I incorporate a lot of illustration work in my designs. I love using whimsical shapes and bold colors and I am always striving to leave a strong impression with my work. I am also experienced in photography, animation, and 3D modeling. I always try to find new ways to express my creativity, and no matter the tool I try to create something unique.

  Rating stars is an important tool for me. So if you do not rate my concept, it is considered a failure...

about: I've been a Graphic Designer for the past 23 years now, and have been freelance for the last 10. I've previously worked in many genres of design, gaining a vast array of experience. These have included a print studio, a banner firm and an Architect firm, covering everything from logos to large format, hand sketching to vector design. I am very passionate about my work, and love how every new project is completely different, it’s what keeps the job so enjoyable!

about: Hey! I am Rajan, a professional graphic designer with over 4 years of professional work experience. I'm proficient in Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, and Adobe Indesign. I specialize in logo designing, branding, and print designs. Having worked with over 150+ brands varying from newly established businesses to renowned brands, I understand how much value, a meaningful, unique design can add to one's brand. I strive to provide top-quality work to my clients to help grow their businesses.

about: I come from a background of New Product Development, design and illustration.  Free of any particular style, I enjoy to create powerful aesthetics that form a world of their own.
tags: ['Product label', 'Logo design', 'Book cover', 'Product packaging', 'Illustration or graphics', 'Other design', 'Logo & social media pack', 'Other book or magazine', 'Other art or illustration', 'Logo & business card', 'Logo & brand guide']
reviews: ['BankSea was phenomenal! Fast work and very quick to respond. ', 'Amazing designer!\r\rWas very patient and threw up many different options. Cannot recommend highly enough', 'Hi AlexNo worries at all and it is a pleasure to work on your label project.  I am currently based in the Cape Winelands, South Africa (but bounce between here and Bordeaux, France).  I have close family that lives in Australia too :-)  My email address is:kelly@breede.co.zaI work internationally so time differences are something that I am well used to and adapt accordingly.  I too would welcome working with you in the future, please do get in touch when you require my services.  On the current Roseville project, please email me if you have any questions or if your printer has any questions, I would also like to look at the proof that the printer draws up before going to print so that I can make 100% sure that everything is perfect before they do the print run.  I would also like to do your back label, so when you are ready, please email me (to the above address) with the information and I can do the artwork.I thoroughly enjoyed the project!Kind RegardsKelly (BankSea)', 'This designer was patient and worked with me helping me create exactly what I didn’t know I was looking for!! ', 'Once again, Bank Sea did a great job.', 'It has been a pleasure working with BankSea. Extremely professional! I highly recommend him!', 'The design was spot on from the start.  Only a few tweaks were requested.', 'the cooperation was really great, the designs were exactly as we imagined them - new designs were also delivered very quickly when changes were needed and the communication was straightforward. ', 'EXCELLENT VISION and a pleasure to work with. Enjoyed the ease of communication and Inspiration they provided throughout the process!! WILL Work with Again!', 'Another great project complete.  On time, on budget and great work', 'Very professional. Pleasure to do business with.', 'Once again, very easy to work with.  On time, on budget and great work', 'Great design, exactly what we wanted, very quick to respond to questions or requests. Thanks!', 'We loved the design created.  It fit our requirements, was elegant and creative.  All details were provided in a very prompt and professional manner - very easy to work with!', 'I have done several projects in 99 designs.  BankSea was the easiest to work with and completed this project to our complete satisfaction in a matter of 3 days, including revisions', 'Great work, and easy to work with.  Designs were all on point and very creative.', 'We loved the design concept! Thank you!', 'Kelly came in with one simple design and captured the essence of what we wanted. She definitely is an artist and that comes through on her work. Communication between us has been a pleasure and I will definitely use her for any other designs we need in ...', 'Kelly did a great job! Very satisfied. Always available for discussing details, ideas and modifications. Very organized and creative. I would strongly recommend her and contact her again for future demands!!!', 'easy and prompt.', "Immaculate. Squirrell's design is everything I didn't know I wanted. Prompt and communicative with adjustments and redesigns, and her input on alterations was invaluable. I wouldn't hesitate to work with her again, and more than likely will.", 'Creative, thoughtful, and attentive to provided specifications - fantastic!']

about:
